amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to increase and decrease the funding for CBP Operations and Support by $496 million to allow CBP to use these funds to hire additional CBP Officers for ports of entry, in addition to new U.S. Border Patrol Agents.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to increase and decrease the funding for U.S. Customs and Border Protection Operations and Support by $496,260,000, to allow the agency to use these funds to hire additional officers for ports of entry, in addition to new U.S. Border Patrol agents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 223 (Roll no. 442).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 223 (Roll no. 442).
